Shohei Ohtani

Name Note: Name is sometimes romanized as Otani

Positions: Designated Hitter and Pitcher

Bats: Left  •  Throws: Right

6-3, 210lb (190cm, 95kg)

Team: Los Angeles Dodgers (majors)

Born: July 5, 1994 (Age: 30-343d) in Oshu, Japan jp

High School: Hanamaki Higashi (Iwate, Japan)

Debut: March 29, 2018 (Age 23-267d, 21,568th in major league history)
   vs. OAK 5 AB, 1 H, 0 HR, 0 RBI, 0 SB

Rookie Status: Exceeded rookie limits during 2018 season

2025 Contract Status: Signed thru 2033, 10 yrs/$282.17M (24-33)

Service Time (01/2025): 7.000  •  Free Agent: 2034

Agents: CAA Sports

Full Name: Shohei Ohtani

Nicknames: Showtime

Pronunciation: \show-HEY oh-TAWN-ee\

Instagram: @shoheiohtani

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Shohei Ohtani?

Shohei Ohtani is 30 years old.

When was Shohei Ohtani born?

Shohei Ohtani was born on July 5, 1994.

Where was Shohei Ohtani born?

Shohei Ohtani was born in Oshu, Iwate.

How tall is Shohei Ohtani?

Shohei Ohtani is 6-3 (190 cm) tall.

How much does Shohei Ohtani weigh?

Shohei Ohtani weighs 210 lbs (95 kg).

How many seasons has Shohei Ohtani played?

Shohei Ohtani is in his 8th season.

What position does Shohei Ohtani play?

Shohei Ohtani is a Designated Hitter and Pitcher.

How many hits does Shohei Ohtani have?

Shohei Ohtani has 78 hits this season and has 956 hits over his career.

How many home runs does Shohei Ohtani have?

Shohei Ohtani has 23 home runs this season and has 248 home runs over his career.

What is Shohei Ohtani's average?

Shohei Ohtani has a .290 average this season and has a .282 average over his career.

How much is Shohei Ohtani worth?

Shohei Ohtani makes $28,216,944.00 this year. His current contract terms are 10 yrs/$282.17M (24-33).

How many teams has Shohei Ohtani played for?

Shohei Ohtani has played for 2 teams; the Los Angeles Angels and Los Angeles Dodgers.

How many World Series has Shohei Ohtani won?

Shohei Ohtani has won 1 World Series.

What is Shohei Ohtani's Instagram account?

Shohei Ohtani is on Instagram at shoheiohtani.

What are Shohei Ohtani's nicknames?

Showtime is a nickname for Shohei Ohtani.
